Brief description: Volcanic eruption data for all known volcanic events on earth.
Preprocessing: Details such as region, subregion, tectonic setting, dominant rock type are given.
Reference: Siebert, Lee, and Tom Simkin. "Volcanoes of the world: an illustrated catalog of Holocene volcanoes and their eruptions." (2014).
Creator: E. Venzke et al.

Brief description: Seismic activities from a coal mine.
Preprocessing: Seismic activity was classified as hazardous or not.
Reference: pages = 91–114 Sikora, Marek, and Beata Sikora. "Rough natural hazards monitoring." Rough Sets: Selected Methods and Applications in Management and Engineering. Springer London, 2012. 163–179.
Creator: M. Sikora et al.
